hero.title: Preserving - Growing - Simplifying
hero.description: At Assetance, we prioritize three core values — Preservation, Growth, and Simplicity. We're committed to providing a safer investment market for your wealth compared to other investment options. Our mission extends to cultivating your financial prosperity and simplifying the path to success. Assetance stands as a partner in your financial journey, making wealth preservation, growth, and accessibility integral to your brighter, more secure future.

values.description: At Assetance, our core values shape every aspect of our business, defining who we are and guiding our decisions. These values are the foundation of our commitment to investors, partners, and the real estate community.

value1.title: integrity
value1.description: Upholding the highest ethical standards, we prioritize transparency and honesty in all our interactions.

value2.title: Accessibility
value2.description: Committed to breaking down barriers, we make real estate investing accessible to a broader audience, promoting financial inclusivity.

value3.title: Client-Centric Focus
value3.description: Placing our clients at the forefront, we are dedicated to understanding and meeting their unique needs, ensuring a positive and rewarding experience.

cta.title: join our newsletter
cta.description: get the latest updates about Assetance and the real estate market
cta.privacy-policy-agreament: By clicking Sign Up you're confirming that you agree to our privacy policy.

solution1.title: individuals investments facilitation
solution1.description: facilitating investments for individuals directly through our easy to use investor portal, in 10 minuets new investors can trade in real estate market from one easy to use web application.

solution2.title: accountants and investment managers portal
solution2.description: Assetance provides profisional accounts for capital managers, accountants and other financial profitionals acting on behalf of an investor.

solution3.title: trading market integration
solution3.description: businesses can integrate our state of the art trading market system (REFNAQS) to provide their customers with access to the best real estate shares trading system.

hero.title: unlocking real estate investing for everyone
hero.description: Investing Made Accessible With Low-Cost Shares, Hassle-Free  Management, and Freedom to Buy and Sell on Your Terms.

fractional-investing.title: Benefit From Fractional Real Estate Investing

benefit1.title: Lower Entry Costs
benefit1.description: Begin with a fraction of the full property cost.

benefit4.title: Investing For All Levels
benefit4.description: Open to all investors, newcomers and experts.

step1.title: Explore our listed properties
step1.description: Discover a diverse range of investment opportunities in our carefully curated selection of properties.

step2.title: Select a property you want to invest in
step2.description: Once you've found a property that aligns with your investment goals, select it to begin your journey.

step3.title: Hold and collect returns while monitoring its status
step3.description: Sit back and relax while your investment generate returns, and you can easily monitor its performance through your dedicated dashboard.

step4.title: Put it for sale or wait until property exit
step4.description: Enjoy flexibility. You can choose to put your shares for sale on our integrated market whenever you wish, Your investment, your choice.

source1.title: Rental Income
source1.description: Earn passive rent income from your investments.

source2.title: Appreciation
source2.description: Track the growth of your shares’ value overtime, then put for sale whenever you want.

feat1.title: Shares on your terms
feat1.description: Put your property shares for sale anytime you want.

feat2.title: Expert Property Management
feat2.description: Enjoy the benefits of ownership & leave management on our experts

feat3.title: No boundaries
feat3.description: Invest from anywhere in the world, we support +150 countries.

feat4.title: Easy diversification
feat4.description: Easley diversify your portfolio with our multi market properties.

reason1.title: capital appreciation
reason1.description: Appreciating over time, providing potential for substantial returns.

reason2.title: Passive income
reason2.description: Ongoing income, creating a source of financial stability.

reason3.title: Inflation hedge
reason3.description: Acts like a hedge against inflation, preserving purchasing power.

reason4.title: Low market volatility
reason4.description: historically shows less volatility compared to other investments.
